body: Somebody once told me... Slut brat must be taught a lesson
Hope the Mesugaki guy gets to this one.

That's why the thumbnail exist mate @dripjesus. At least this guy care enough to tag just enough for this to be searchable and not lost in the Void once it passed the Front Page.| The first two was good bait there, as we proceed in deeper there appeared this equation: The shitter the Art, the better the Plot and vice versa.
